news.title: Live Report: Oklou turns darkness into light on the Academy stage
news.summary: Humble and soft, with angelic vocals and a grasp on electronic music that is entirely her own, Oklou delivered a stunning visual and vocal performance on Wednesday evening, allowing fans into the intimate world of choke enough, in the final moments before she reaches ultimate musical stardom.

news.title: Alanis Morissette announces run of Ireland and UK shows next summer
news.summary: Tickets go on general sale on Friday, December 12.

news.title: Peaky Blinders film The Immortal Man to come out in March
news.summary: The film will premiere in select cinemas on March 6 and on Netflix on March 20.

news.title: Janet Devlin: "People misunderstand the genre so much; they think it’s just old-timey, but it’s true storytelling"
news.summary: As she releases Not My First Emotional Rodeo – a deluxe edition of her most recent album – Janet Devlin discusses the unstoppable rise of country music, incorporating emo and pop influences, and the joys of playing with a live band.

news.title: 100 ex-professional footballers to be offered free health screenings
news.summary: The Irish Professional Footballers Benevolent Association have teamed up with Advanced Medical Services for an initiative aimed at protecting and enhancing the wellbeing of former players.

news.title: Moonlight: The Philip Lynott Enigma to return to Vicar Street in June
news.summary: The rock / theatre production will return on June 11 and 12.

news.title: FILM OF THE WEEK: Eternity - Reviewed by Roe McDermott
news.summary: Stylish high-concept rom-com keeps its intriguing premise sweet and simple.
